title.en: An Aspiration Prayer of Mahāyāna Mind Training

text.en: Namo guru!
text.en-trans: namo guru

text.en: Incomparable teacher, king of the Śākyas,
text.en-trans: tönpa nyammé shakyé gyalpo dang

text.en: Avalokiteśvara and reverend noble Tārā,
text.en-trans: chenrezik dang jetsün drolmé zhab

text.en: Lord Acala, sovereign of the wrathful ones,
text.en-trans: trowö gyalpo mi yo gönpo dang

text.en: Sole deity, great Jowo Atiśa and your heirs—
text.en-trans: lha chik jowo chenpo yabsé nam

text.en: Remain upon my, an evil person's, crown,
text.en-trans: mi ngen dak gi tsuk gi gyen zhuk né

text.en: And inspire me to mix my body, speech and mind with Dharma.
text.en-trans: go sum chö dang drepar jingyi lob

text.en: This perfect support with its freedoms and advantages
text.en-trans: ten zhi püntsok dal dang jorpa di

text.en: Presents a one-in-a-hundred-lifetimes opportunity.
text.en-trans: dü gya len chik tobpa daré tsam

text.en: With the mirror of this human life of leisure
text.en-trans: mitsé södal kyalwé melong yi

text.en: Unspoilt by demonic forces, may I make it meaningful
text.en-trans: dü kyi ma lü daré dön yö du

text.en: And exert myself with intense effort in the sacred Dharma.
text.en-trans: dampé chö la bepa drakpö tsön

text.en: I cannot be certain which will come first:
text.en-trans: sang dang jikten chimé nangwa nyi

text.en: Tomorrow or the appearances of the next life.
text.en-trans: ngön la gang jung ngepar cha mi tsal

text.en: And since this wicked habit of procrastination
text.en-trans: yün ring döpé drab chü ngenpa di

text.en: Will only ruin my chances of lasting happiness,
text.en-trans: ten dé dünma lakpar jepé na

text.en: May I apply myself to the Dharma ever so swiftly.
text.en-trans: nyurwa nyurwar chö la bepar shok

text.en: Having ignited the great forest fire of diligence,
text.en-trans: tsöndrü nak kyi mé chen rab bar né

text.en: So that the ocean of saṃsāric existence runs dry,
text.en-trans: khorwé gyatso kempar jepa dang

text.en: The incalculable acts, good and bad, that I’ve amassed
text.en-trans: karnak sakpé lé la drang mi chö

text.en: Will not be apportioned to anybody else.
text.en-trans: zhen la go kal jé duma chi shing

text.en: All the weapons I’ve forged will be deployed against me,
text.en-trans: rang jé tsöncha tamché rang la khor

text.en: And I will undoubtedly experience my own comeuppance.
text.en-trans: rang gi pungpor nyongwa dön mi za

text.en: May I find certainty as to the infallible ripening of actions,
text.en-trans: karnak lé kyi drebu manorwa

text.en: The unerring fruition of wholesome and unwholesome acts.
text.en-trans: min la luwa mepé ngé nyé shok

text.en: As the major consequence of accumulated evil deeds,
text.en-trans: lé ngen sakpé drebu chenpo ni

text.en: I will suffer uninterruptedly in the realms of saṃsāra.
text.en-trans: khorwé né na dukngal gyünché mé

text.en: The torments of the three lower realms are unbearable.
text.en-trans: ngensong sum gyi dukngal zö du mé

text.en: The joys of the higher realms transform and fade away.
text.en-trans: tori sum gyi dewa gyur né dro

text.en: We are trapped within the sufferings that origination brings.
text.en-trans: künjung gyü kyé dukngal zeb tu tsü

text.en: Not even so much as an atom is immune to the three sufferings.
text.en-trans: dukngal sum gyi ma khyab dul tsammé

text.en: In order to interrupt the flow of negative tendencies
text.en-trans: né ngen len gyi gyün tak chöpé chir

text.en: May I follow a guide who shows the way to liberation.
text.en-trans: tarpé lam tön shenyen tenpar shok

text.en: May I encounter precious bodhicitta, which is
text.en-trans: manor lamzang chö kyi nyingkhu ni

text.en: The essence of Dharma, the excellent, unmistaken way.
text.en-trans: rinchen changchub sem dang trepar shok

text.en: May I recollect the sources of refuge, guru and three supreme jewels,
text.en-trans: kyabné lama chok sum drenpa dang

text.en: And with faith and devotion, may I establish the foundation of the path.
text.en-trans: dé dang mögü lam gyi zhi tsa tsuk

text.en: Guarding the guru's instructions like the heart within my chest,
text.en-trans: lamé damngak khokpé nying tar zung

text.en: May I offer fervent prayer at all times,
text.en-trans: dü nam küntu solwa drakpo deb

text.en: And may the glorious guru inspire me with blessings.
text.en-trans: palgön lamé jinlab jukpar shok

text.en: Sentient beings have been so very kind to me:
text.en-trans: semchen dinam dak gi drinchen yin

text.en: They have been my parents throughout beginningless time—
text.en-trans: tokma mé né dak gi pama jé

text.en: Kind mothers, who have treated me with boundless care.
text.en-trans: kudrin tsemé takpé drinchen ma

text.en: Now they are immersed in the ocean of suffering,
text.en-trans: danta dukngal gyatsö long du tsü

text.en: Seized by the sea monsters of misery and misdeeds.
text.en-trans: dik dang dukngal chusin gyi zung nam

text.en: Thinking about this well, it is impossible to bear;
text.en-trans: lekpar sam na senpé gokab dral

text.en: It is enough to make me weep profusely
text.en-trans: mik gi chima drak tu trukpa dang

text.en: And engender overwhelming love and compassion.
text.en-trans: shé mizöpé jam dang nyingjé gom

text.en: All my own happiness I transmit to my old mothers,
text.en-trans: rang gi dewa magen nam la jin

text.en: And their suffering, in cause and result, I take upon myself.
text.en-trans: denam dukngal gyundré rang la lang

text.en: May I even give away this body of mine countless times
text.en-trans: lü di yang ni drangmé jin jé né

text.en: And conquer the terrible demon of self-clinging.
text.en-trans: dak tu dzinpé dré chen lakpar shok

text.en: All faults arise from my clinging to a self.
text.en-trans: nyepa tamché rang dakdzin lé jung

text.en: All beings including my supposed enemies
text.en-trans: dra lasokpé semchen dé kün ni

text.en: Are simply teachers offering me assistance.
text.en-trans: ngepar pendok geweshé dang tsung

text.en: Enemies, demons and obstacles are my own delusion.
text.en-trans: dra dön gek nang rangnyi trulpa yin

text.en: Sickness and evil influences are but buddha manifestations,
text.en-trans: nedön tamché gyalwé namtrul dang

text.en: Gods and demons, assistants of awakening;
text.en-trans: lha dang dré nam changchub drubpé drok

text.en: Fortune and advantage, the contrivance of māras.
text.en-trans: lek gu tünkyen dü kyi chotrul yin

text.en: May sickness, suffering and adversity
text.en-trans: natsa dukngal kyen ngen changchub kyi

text.en: Assist me as I develop supreme bodhicitta.
text.en-trans: sem chok pelwé tab la jungwar shok

text.en: The unmistakable enemy is within my heart:
text.en-trans: drawo manor nying la zhukpa yi

text.en: This great demon of attachment to I and mine.
text.en-trans: nga dang nga yir dzinpé gong chen di

text.en: Now that I see it, through the guru's kindness,
text.en-trans: danta dak gi lamé drin lé tong

text.en: I shall certainly take the sufferings that you,
text.en-trans: ngepar khyö mi gawé dukngal nam

text.en: O demon, so dislike and give them all to you.
text.en-trans: ngé kyi lang né gongpo khyö la jin

text.en: Fame, riches and the things that delight you
text.en-trans: drak nyen jor sok khyö la gawé dzé

text.en: I shall steal them all from you without exception
text.en-trans: chik kyang malü trok né khyö kyi ni

text.en: And give them away to the beings you revile.
text.en-trans: dra ru zungwé semchen dé la jin

text.en: May they receive this gift of mine in such a way.
text.en-trans: jinpa dezhin ngepar tob gyur chik

text.en: Noble sentient beings are exceptionally kind.
text.en-trans: jowo semchen dinam kadrin ché

text.en: May I never seek to awaken myself if this would
text.en-trans: dinam la ni drok ngen jepa ru

text.en: Make me a bad friend to them,
text.en-trans: dak ni namyang sangye la mi mön

text.en: But act as an ordinary being for ordinary beings' sake.
text.en-trans: semchen tsul gyi semchen dönjé shok

text.en: Let this body of mine become a wish-granting jewel
text.en-trans: nga yi lü di yizhin norbu tar

text.en: To fulfil the hopes and aspirations of all beings,
text.en-trans: drowa nam kyi rewa kang jé né

text.en: So that they may attain supreme and perfect awakening,
text.en-trans: denam dzoksang gyé chok tobpa dang

text.en: And may this supreme mind not decline but further increase.
text.en-trans: dak gi sem chok ma nyam gongpel shok

text.en: Donning the armour of hardship and endurance,
text.en-trans: kaché zöpé gocha rab gö né

text.en: May I realise how all phenomena lack true reality.
text.en-trans: chö nam rangzhin denmé shepa dang

text.en: And with the supreme vajra mind that has no beginning, middle or end,
text.en-trans: rangzhin döndam tong sal gakpamé

text.en: The unobstructed emptiness and clarity of the ultimate nature,
text.en-trans: tokta üdral sem chok dorjé yi

text.en: May I banish the darkness of the two kinds of obscuration,
text.en-trans: drib nyi münpa ring du pang jé né

text.en: And with the expansive light of genuine wisdom,
text.en-trans: yangdak yeshe nangwa gyepa yi

text.en: Have the power and skill to come to beings' aid.
text.en-trans: drowé dön la tutob tsalden shok

text.en: Realizing the liberational deeds of the heroic Mañjuśrī
text.en-trans: jampal pawö namtar ngön jé né

text.en: And immersing myself in oceanic bodhisattva activity
text.en-trans: changchub chöpé gyatsor zhol zhindu

text.en: For as long as sentient beings remain,
text.en-trans: semchen tongpar magyur desi du

text.en: May I perfectly accomplish their welfare.
text.en-trans: dé yi dön nam rabtu drubpar shok

text.en: May I make offerings to an ocean of buddhas,
text.en-trans: sangye gyatso chöpa jepa dang

text.en: Thoroughly purify an ocean of realms,
text.en-trans: zhingkham gyatso yongsu jangwa dang

text.en: Bring to maturity an ocean of beings,
text.en-trans: semchen gyatso yongsu minpa la

text.en: And access the vast ocean of wisdom.
text.en-trans: yeshe gyatso ché la jukpar shok
